sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Certayne causes gathered together wherin is shewed the decaye of Engla[n]d, only by the great multitude of shepe, to the vtter decay of houshold keping, mayntenau[n]ce of men, dearth of corne, and other notable dyscommodityes approued by syxe olde prouerbes.
[23] p.
Imprinted at London in Pouls churche yearde at the sygne of Saynct Austen by Heugh Syngelton, [London] : [1552?]
Imprint taken from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: A⁸ B⁴. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

[23] p.
Imprinted at London in Pouls churche yearde at the sygne of Saynct Austen by Heugh Syngelton, [London] : [1552?]
